pages.text: $(l)plain text$() = command text $(br2)$(l)<argument>$() = argument that should replaced with the value$(br2)$(l)<entry>$() = optional entry $(br2)$(l)(entry|entry)$() = Pick one of the required entries $(br2)$(l)[entry|entry]$() = Pick one of the optional entries $(br2)$(l)ellipsis ...$() = another sub-command required
